root.name: Game Party Champions
root.description: OverviewGame Party Champions is a party game developed by Phosphor Games exclusively for the Wii U. It's launching in time for the 2012 holiday season.Players will be able to tilt, turn and swipe the GamePad in these skill-based games centered around sports, arcade- and party-games. Games announced so far are hoopshot, table hockey, football and baseball while the box art also hints at ping pong, golf and bowling being involved in some fashion. The game is divided up into various modes like Quick Play, Story Mode and Party Mode.
